https://tmrev.io/movie/57025-Desperadas 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/y2vwsQHt7PnMBXSsqohl0bdkLOO.jpg The story is about four beautiful half-sisters - Isabella, Courtney, Stephanie and Patricia - who have problems in their personal life. Isabella has issues with commitment, Stephanie is having problems with her husband Richard, Courtney's boyfriend Patrick becomes a Born again Christian and Patricia publishes her new sex book much to the dismay of her husband who's having trouble with their relationship as a couple. Desperadas
